name: n8n
description: n8n is a workflow automation platform that combines AI capabilities with no-code and code-based solutions to streamline business processes.
longDescription: n8n is a fair-code licensed workflow automation tool designed to help technical teams connect apps, APIs, and internal tools to create efficient, multi-step workflows. Founded in 2019, it empowers users to automate repetitive tasks with a visual builder or custom code, offering both self-hosted and cloud-based options. Its mission is to provide flexibility, combining the speed of no-code with the precision of coding, while ensuring data privacy through self-hosting capabilities. With over 400 integrations and native AI support, n8n serves businesses, developers, and IT teams by simplifying complex automation tasks. The platform’s community-driven approach and extensive template library make it accessible for users to quickly implement solutions tailored to their needs. Its fair-code model ensures visible source code and extensibility, fostering a passionate global community.
features: Visual workflow builder enables drag-and-drop creation of automation workflows, saving time for non-coders.
Over 400 integrations connect apps like Google Sheets, Slack, and Notion, enabling seamless data flow.
Native AI capabilities allow integration of large language models to enhance workflows with intelligent automation.
Self-hosting option ensures data privacy and control by running n8n on personal servers or cloud environments.
Custom code support lets developers write JavaScript or Python to extend functionality for complex use cases.
Community template library provides over 3,000 pre-built workflows to accelerate automation setup.
Webhook and API support enables real-time data triggers and connectivity with custom or external systems.
Form trigger feature allows quick creation of lead generation or data capture forms within workflows.

faqs.question: What is n8n used for?
faqs.answer: n8n is used to automate workflows by connecting apps, APIs, and internal tools, streamlining tasks like data syncing, lead generation, and process automation.

faqs.question: Is n8n free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, n8n offers a free Community Edition for self-hosting with unlimited workflows, though some advanced features require an Enterprise license.

faqs.question: Can I self-host n8n?
faqs.answer: Yes, n8n supports self-hosting on platforms like Docker or Kubernetes, giving users full control over their data and infrastructure.

faqs.question: Does n8n support custom code?
faqs.answer: n8n allows users to write JavaScript or Python within workflows, enabling advanced customization for complex automation needs.

faqs.question: What kind of integrations does n8n offer?
faqs.answer: n8n provides over 400 integrations with apps like Google Sheets, Slack, Telegram, and OpenAI, plus support for custom APIs and webhooks.

faqs.question: How does n8n compare to tools like Zapier or Make?
faqs.answer: Unlike Zapier or Make, n8n offers self-hosting, fair-code licensing, and greater customization through code, making it ideal for technical teams.

faqs.question: Can n8n be used for AI-powered automation?
faqs.answer: Yes, n8n’s native AI capabilities allow users to integrate large language models to create intelligent, automated workflows.

faqs.question: Is there a community to support n8n users?
faqs.answer: n8n has a vibrant community of over 200,000 members, offering forums, templates, and resources to help users build and troubleshoot workflows.
